sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu"> <x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <ghana_padamu> a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ-dhanu̠stvagṃ a̠va̠tatya̠-a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠-saha̍srākṣa̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ a̠va̠tatya̠-a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠** dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠-saha̍srākṣa̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ-dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē-śatē̍ṣudhē saha̍srākṣa̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ-dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē** saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē-śatē̍ṣudhē saha̍srākṣa̠-saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍-śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śatē̍ṣudhē saha̍srākṣa̠-saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍** śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍-śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śatē̍ṣudhē-śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō-śi̠vō śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śatē̍ṣudhē-śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō** śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō-śi̠vō śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍-śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍-na̍-ssu̠manā̍ śi̠vō śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍-śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍** śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍-na̍-ssu̠manā̍ śi̠vō-śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍ bhava-bhava na̍-ssu̠manā̍ śi̠vō-śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍ bhava** na̍-ssu̠manā̍ bhava-bhava na̍-ssu̠manā̍ ** bhava** ** </ghana_padamu> <name>  a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa</name> <order>10</order> <padamu display_value="Sri Rudram">a79e9faec327461049521d12b4013105</padamu> <padamustring>  a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē । ni̠śīrya̍ śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍ bhava </padamustring> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-07-25 16:24:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0765bbe6c363021049521d12b40131c7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-07-25 16:24:31</sys_updated_on> <word_list>a̠va̠tatya̠ dhanu̠stvagṃ saha̍srākṣa̠ śatē̍ṣudhē śa̠lyānā̠-mmukhā̍ śi̠vō na̍-ssu̠manā̍ bhava </word_list> </x_146833_vedamwork_ghanapadamu> </record_update>
